name: World Deflect
description:
World Deflect is a game about protecting your planet from the space junk. This game was made for the Ludum dare 38 compo.

How to Play

When you start you just ahve the power meter at the bottom of your screen. When space junk is coming click space bar on the green if you can to do the most damage. You can then hit the arrow in the top right to open the store. From there you can expore the tools at your disposal.

Controls

Fire rockets- hit the number 2./ Right click in shop.

Nuke - Right click in shop.

Buy something in shop- Left click

Goal- Get to 10,000,000,000 population
